他就是一款我挚爱的有可能会有其他游戏阶段性替代的，但是总会回来继续玩的游戏 。喜怒哀乐不光人生品尝了一遍，在这里也一样。

This game, like many others; while mainly fun with friends can be many times over more entertaining when playing with random members of the community. 

Although I would recommend a prime account, you don't need to spend money to have a good time. From hilarious competitive matches to fooling around in a death match round, it's not all that serious that people make it out to be. 

Give it a try, I promise you wont be disappointed.
